summary: A small-town piano teacher is shocked by the arrival of her foster daughter's real mother, whose young lover soon follows and causes further disruption.
cast: Inga Landgré|Stig Olin|Marianne Löfgren|Dagny Lind|Allan Bohlin|Ernst Eklund|Signe Wirff|Margit Andelius|Wiktor Andersson|Anna-Lisa Baude|Carin Cederström|Julia Cæsar|Gus Dahlström|Sture Ericson|Karl Erik Flens|Hariette Garellick|Mona Geijer-Falkner|Hortensia Hedström|Svea Holst|Maud Hyttenberg|Holger Höglund|Ulf Johansson|Arne Lindblad|Singoalla Lundbäck|John Melin|Gustaf Molander|Dagmar Olsson|Manetta Ryberg|Siv Thulin
title: Crisis
